name: @neurolint/cli
description: NeuroLint CLI - Advanced rule-based code analysis and transformation tool using AST parsing and sophisticated pattern matching

scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc src/cli-production.ts src/commands/analyze-fixed.ts src/commands/fix-fixed.ts src/commands/init.ts src/commands/config.ts src/commands/status.ts src/commands/login.ts src/utils/config.ts src/types.ts --outDir dist --target ES2020 --module CommonJS --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --moduleResolution node --declaration
scripts.test:all: npm run dev -- help && npm run dev -- init --force && npm run dev -- status

author: NeuroLint Team
